_doc: Reusable bar chart panel: shows total battery drop percentage grouped by mode.
_usage: Copy this panel into any dashboard. Replace bucket, measurement, field, and mission filter in the query. The query uses difference() to compute point-to-point battery changes, then sums per mode. Negative values = discharge, positive = charge. The map multiplies by -100 to show discharge as positive percentages.

targets._comment: Uses difference() for point-to-point battery changes summed per mode. Replace bucket, measurement, field, and mission filter.
targets.query:
from(bucket: "vessel-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery_telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_percentage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.mission == "${mission}")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -100.0}))
  |> group(columns: ["mode"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["mode", "_value"])
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Battery Drop (%)"})

title: Total Battery Drop by Mode
